scripts.precoverage:html: which lcov && which genhtml && lcov --directory build/Release/ --zerocounters
scripts.coverage:html: npm run test && lcov --directory . --capture --output-file build/coverage.info && lcov --remove build/coverage.info '*boost*' '*googletest*' '*4.9*' --output-file build/coverage.info.cleaned && genhtml -o build/coverage build/coverage.info.cleaned
scripts.coverage:gcov: npm run test && cd build && i=$(node ../bin/glob.js 'Release/**/*.o') && for f in $i; do gcov-4.9 -p -r $f; done;
